subject: RE: [junit] ClasspathWalker (even better)
msgSnippet: ... [...] ... I bet it s related to a phenomenon I ve been struck by the past day or so: There have been so many posts to this email group between now and
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: bernd [mailto:berndq@...]
[...]
> I am curious why nobody responded to my mail where I suggested
> the same architecture? Did you overlook? Is my english so bad that
> nobody understood it?

I bet it's related to a phenomenon I've been struck by the past day or so:

There have been so many posts to this email group between now and yesterday that I deleted a bunch without reading them. Others may have done the same. Not to mention we've had one original thread spawn into at least 3 other threads, which have been responsible for most of the traffic.

I'd suggest some folks should think more between posts or take a discussion offline until things are resolved, then come back with a summary. But this is so unusual for this list (thinking over the past few years), it will probably return to normal soon by themselves.

Scott Stirling
Framingham, MA
